item.title: Acidic Fire
item.fluff: Green flames burn and spread boiling acid in all directions
item.headline: acidic fire ammunition

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within 10 squares (each creature in the burst); Item's level +4 vs. Reflex
Hit1d6 fire damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).
Level 102d6 fire damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage.
Level 153d6 fire damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage.
Level 203d6 fire damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage.
Level 255d6 fire damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage.
Level 304d6 fire damage, and ongoing 15 acid damage.
MissHalf damage.

item.title: Alchemical Silver
item.fluff: This shimmering liquid clings to a weapon, giving it the appearance of brightly polished silver

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectMelee touch (one weapon or bundle of ammunition); Until the end of the encounter, Weapon attacks using the target count as silvered. A magic weapon or magic ammunition of 15th level or higher gains no benefit from this item.

Level 15Weapon attacks using the target deal an additional 1d6 damage to creatures that have vulnerable to silver, or have another weakness to it.A magic weapon or magic ammunition of 25th level or higher gains no benefit from this item.

Level 25Weapon attacks using the target deal an additional 2d6 damage to creatures that have vulnerable to silver, or have another weakness to it. A magic weapon or magic ammunition of 35th level or higher gains no benefit from this item.

item.title: Alchemist's Acid
item.fluff: When shattered, this glass vial releases a spray of acid
item.headline: acid ammunition

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 5/10 (one creature); Item's level + 4 vs Reflex
Hit 2d6 acid damage.
Level 62d6 acid damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).
Level 113d6 acid damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).
Level 163d6 acid damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends).
Level 215d6 acid damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends).
Level 265d6 acid damage, and ongoing 15 acid damage (save ends).
MissHalf damage.

item.title: Alchemist's Fire
item.fluff: When shattered, this flask fills an area with alchemical flame
item.headline: fire ammunition

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within 10 squares (each creature in the burst); Item's level + 4 vs Reflex
Hit 1d6 fire damage.
Level 62d6 fire damage.
Level 114d6 fire damage.
Level 165d6 fire damage.
Level 216d6 fire damage.
Level 267d6 fire damage.
MissHalf damage.

item.title: Alchemist's Frost
item.fluff: This ceramic flask explodes in an icy haze when it hits, crippling its target with numbing cold
item.headline: frost ammunition

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 5/10 (one creature); Item's level + 4 vs Reflex
Hit 1d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.
Level 62d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.
Level 112d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed and cannot make opportunity attacks until the end of its next turn.
Level 163d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed and cannot make opportunity attacks until the end of its next turn.
Level 214d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed, cannot make opportunity attacks, and grants combat advantage until the end of its next turn.
Level 264d6 cold damage, and the target is slowed, cannot make opportunity attacks, and grants combat advantage until the end of its next turn.
MissHalf damage.

item.title: Alchemist's Spark
item.fluff: The shattered flask releases two clouds that quickly coalesce and release a dazzling blast of energy
item.headline: shock ammunition

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within 10 squares (each creature in the burst); Item's level +4 vs. Reflex
Hit 1d6 lightning damage.
Level 82d6 lightning damage.
Level 134d6 lightning damage.
Level 185d6 lightning damage.
Level 236d6 lightning damage.
Level 287d6 lightning damage.
EffectThe target takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the end of its next turn.
Level 18, 23 or 28-2 penalty to all attack rolls (save ends).

item.title: Antivenom
item.fluff: This thick tonic can help counter the effects of most poisons

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against poisons from a source of 10th level or lower. This effect lasts for 5 minutes.
Level 1120th level or lower, and you gain resist 5 poison.
Level 2130th level or lower, and you gain resist 10 poison.

item.title: Augmenting Whetstone
item.fluff: This rough sharpening stone temporarily grants your weapon a magical enhancement

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectMelee 1 (one melee or ranged weapon you hold); The weapon gains a +2 enhancement bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the encounter.
Level 11+3 enhancement bonus.
Level 16+4 enhancement bonus.
Level 21+5 enhancement bonus.
Level 26+6 enhancement bonus.
If the weapon has properties, such as critical damage, that depend on its enhancement bonus, it still uses its normal bonus to determine those properties.

item.title: Beastbane Incense
item.fluff: This rod of fast-burning incense creates a haze of smoke that holds beasts at bay

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 1; the burst creates a zone of incense until the end of the encounter.
Level 14 or 19Close burst 2
Level 24 or 29Close burst 3
Each time a beast enters or starts its turn in the zone, the following attack automatically happens against it:
AttackClose burst special (triggering beast); Item's level +6 vs. Will
Hit The target is slid to the closest space outside of the zone, and if it was moving, it stops. If it has actions remaining, it can use them to resume moving.

item.title: Blastpatch
item.fluff: These granular crystals explore when they are stepped on

block.name: Special
block.line: When this item is created, the creator chooses one of: Fire, Cold, or Lightning. The attack power has the corresponding keyword.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectYou apply the blastpatch to an adjacent, unoccupied square.
When a creature willingly enters the square, the blastpatch makes the following attack. The attack is considered to be made as an immediate interrupt.
AttackClose blast 1 (triggering creature); Item's level +4 vs. Reflex
Hit 2d8 fire damage, 1d6 cold damage, or 1d6 lightning damage.
Level 93d8 fire damage, 2d6 cold damage, or 2d6 lightning damage.
Level 144d8 fire damage, 3d6 cold damage, or 3d6 lightning damage.
Level 195d8 fire damage, or 4d6 cold damage, or 4d6 lightning damage.
Level 246d8 fire damage, or 5d6 cold damage, or 5d6 lightning damage.
Level 298d8 fire damage, or 6d6 cold damage, or 6d6 lightning damage.

The damage depends on the keyword chosen when this item was created. If the chosen keyword is Cold, the target is immobilized until the beginning of its next turn. If the chosen keyword is Lightning, the target grants combat advantage until the end of its next turn.
MissHalf fire damage, the target is slowed until the end of its next turn, or the target grants combat advantage for the first attack made against it before the end of its next turn.
A creature that flies or jumps over the square the blastpatch is in does not trigger the attack.

item.title: Blinding Bomb
item.fluff: When thrown, this fist-sized ceramic sphere explodes in a blinding flash

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within 10 squares (each creature in the burst); Item's level +4 vs. Fortitude
Hit The target is flashbanged (save ends).
CritThe target is blinded until the end of its next turn.
AftereffectThe target is flashbanged (save ends).

While flashbanged, the target treats all nonadjacent creatures as having concealment and creatures more than 4 squares away as having total concealment. Creatures that do not rely on sight to detect other creatures are immune to this effect.
MissThe target is flashbanged until the end of its next turn.

item.title: Bloodstinger Poison
item.fluff: This inky toxin inflicts wounds that burn long after the initial blow is struck

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectMelee touch (one weapon or one piece of ammunition); You apply the poison to the target item. The poison retains potency for 1 hour.
While the poison retains potency and an attack made with the target weapon or ammunition hits a target, you make the following attack against that creature:
AttackItem's level +5 vs. Fortitude
Hit Ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).
Level 13 or 18Ongoing 10 poison damage (save ends).
Level 23 or 28Ongoing 15 poison damage (save ends).

item.title: Bravery Powder
item.fluff: This powder helps fortify the spirit against fear effects

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectMelee touch (one creature); The target can make a saving throw against a Fear effect, even if that effect does not normally end on a save. The source of the effect can be no higher than the item's level +3 (so 6th-level, 8th-level, and so on).
If the target is currently not under a Fear effect, it instead gains a +5 item bonus to the first saving throw it makes against a Fear effect before the end of the encounter.

item.title: Chartreuse Gas
item.fluff: The green mist contained in this glass glove can make dreams and memories seem real

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 2/5 (one creature); item's leve +3 vs. Will
Hit The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
While dazed, the target takes a -5 penalty to Insight checks and passive Insight to resist Bluff attempts, and to all checks to recognize effects as illusory.
SpecialOutside of combat, you can make the attack as part of interacting with a target.

If the attack hits, the target is not dazed, but takes a -5 penalty to triggered attack rolls as long as you continue to interact with it or for 5 minutes, whichever is shorter. The target takes the check penalties like it was dazed while it has this penalty. The target is not aware of these effects.
AftereffectThe target is still slightly affected (save ends).

While slightly affected, the target takes a -2 penalty to triggered attack rolls, and the full check penalties. The target is now aware that it has had an effect on it, but is not aware of the check penalties until before it successfully saves against this aftereffect.

item.title: Clarity Salts
item.fluff: The odor from these tiny crystals is almost strong enough to wake the dead

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectMelee 1 (one creature); The target makes a saving throw against one dazing or stunning effect, even if that effect does not normally end of a save. The source of the effect can be no higher than the item's level +3 (so 7th-level, 9th-level, and so on).
If the target is currently not under a dazing or stunning effect, it instead gains a +5 item bonus to the first saving throw it makes against such an effect before the end of the encounter.

item.title: Clay of Creation
item.fluff: Your summoned creatures are tougher when you activate this reagent during the summoning
item.headline: Formula Cost550 gp
Key SkillArcana, Nature or Religion
Time1 hour

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou use an encounter power or daily power that has the Summoning keyword and is of a lower level than this reagent

EffectThe creature or creatures summoned by the triggering power gain 10 temporary hit points, and the first time an affected summoned creature misses with an attack, reroll the attack roll and use the second result.
Level 1715 temporary hit points.
Level 2720 temporary hit points.

item.title: Clearsense Powder
item.fluff: This fine, silvery powder can restore lost senses

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectMelee 1 (you or one ally); The target makes a saving throw against an effect that blinds or deafens it, even it that effect does not normally end on a save. The source of the effect can be no higher than the item's level +3 (so 4th-level, 6th-level, and so on).

item.title: Clearwater Solution
item.fluff: This small glob of white jelly purifies even the most toxic liquids, from poisons to dwarven spirits

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: LimitationA clearwater solution can be applied to a volume of liquid filling a 5-foot cube (approximately 935 gallons or a sizable barrel). If it is applied to a volume of liquid larger than this, the solution has no effect but is still consumed.
Level 1120-foot cube (approximately 59,900 gallons or a sizable swimming pool).
Level 2150-foot cube (approximately 935,000 gallons or a small lake).

EffectMelee 1 (a volume of liquid); Over the span of 1 minute, the solution removes any poison or disease present in the liquid. It cannot remove poison or disease from water already in a creature's systen, and has no adverse effects on creatures, even one with the Aquatic or Water keywords.

item.title: Clinging Essence
item.fluff: This vial holds enough sticky essense of a distilled element to apply to one weapon

block.name: Special
block.line: When this item is created, the creator chooses one of: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. The utility power has the corresponding damage keyword.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementThe target must of equal level or lower than this item.

EffectMelee touch (one weapon or bundle of ammunition); Until the end of your next turn, nontyped damage dealt by Weapon attacks using the target deal the chosen type of damage instead, and such attacks gain the corresponding damage keyword.

item.title: Clockwork Bomb
item.fluff: You set the device on the ground and hope that it detonates when you want it to

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectYou place the clockwork bomb in your space or in a square adjacent to you, and decide how many rounds pass before the bomb goes off (maximum 6 rounds). The bomb uses your defenses, not counting any temporary bonuses. If an attack hits the bomb, it detonates after that attack has been resolved.
Each round, at the start of your turn, move the bomb one square in a direction of your choise and if all rounds have not passed, roll a d6. On a roll of 6, the bomb detonates prematurely.
When the bomb detonates, make the following attack:
AttackArea burst 1 centered on the bomb (each creature in the burst); item's level +4 vs. Reflex
Hit 1d10 fire damage.
Level 92d10 fire damage.
Level 144d10 fire damage.
Level 195d10 fire damage.
Level 246d10 fire damage.
Level 297d10 fire damage.
MissHalf damage.

item.title: Cognizance Crystal
item.fluff: This multicolored crystal captures unspent psionic power, then crumbles to dust after releasing that energy
item.headline: Formula Cost180 gp
Key SkillArcana
Time1 hour

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou miss all targets with an augmented psionic attack power
EffectYou regain 1 power point.
Level 14Regain 2 power points.
Level 24Regain 3 power points.
You cannot regain more power points than you spent on the triggering power.

item.title: Corpseburster
item.fluff: Death is the trigger for the true virulence of this poisonous fluid
item.headline: Formula Cost200 gp
Key SkillArcana or Thievery
Time30 minutes

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Primary AttackRanged 5/10 (one creature); Item's level +4 vs. Fortitude
HitThe target takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).
AftereffectThe target takes ongoing 2 poison damage (save ends).
Level 10Ongoing 7 poison damage; ongoing 3 poison damage.
Level 15Ongoing 10 poison damage; ongoing 4 poison damage.
Level 20Ongoing 12 poison damage; ongoing 5 poison damage.
Level 25Ongoing 15 poison damage; ongoing 7 poison damage.
Level 30Ongoing 17 poison damage; ongoing 8 poison damage.
EffectIf the target drops to 0 hit points or fewer while it is taking ongoing poison damage from this power, you automatically make the Secondary Attack.
Secondary AttackClose burst 1 from the primary target's space (each creature in the burst, including the primary target); Item's level +5 vs. Reflex
Hit1d8 necrotic damage.
Level 102d8 necrotic damage.
Level 154d8 necrotic damage.
Level 205d8 necrotic damage.
Level 256d8 necrotic damage.
Level 307d8 necrotic damage.
Miss:Minimum damage.

item.title: Corrosive Oil
item.fluff: Nonmetallic armor coated with this oil has the ability to lessen the effectiveness of metallic weapons that strike it

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou apply the oil to a set of nonmetallic armor that you wear. You make the following attack whenever a creature hits you with a metallic weapon, until this attack hits.
AttackItem's level +4 vs. Reflex
Hit The triggering weapon is corroded (save ends).
While corroded, attacks with the triggering weapon take a -1 penalty to attack rolls and a -2 penalty to damage rolls.
AftereffectAttacks with the triggering weapon take a -2 penalty to damage rolls.
Level 8Both damage penalties increase to -3.
Level 13Both damage penalties increase to -5.
Level 18Both damage penalties increas to -6.
Level 23Both damage penalties increase to -8.
Level 28Both damage penalties increase to -10.

item.title: Desert Rose
item.fluff: Growing naturally only in remote desert oases, this yellow flower helps maintain powers
item.headline: Formula Cost550 gp
Key SkillArcana, Nature or Religion
Time1 hour

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou use an encounter power or daily power that can be sustained and is of a lower level than this reagent

EffectYou sustain the triggering power on your next turn without spending an action. The power is automatically sustained at the end of your next turn if you are unable to take actions. Sustaining the power for subsequent rounds requires the appropriate action.
Level 1715 temporary hit points.
Level 2720 temporary hit points.

item.title: Dragonfire Tar
item.fluff: This thick substance sears the target with ongoing flames

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 5/10 (one creature); Item's level +4 vs. Reflex
Hit The target takes ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
CritThe target takes a -5 penalty to its first save against this ongoing damage.
AftereffectOngoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Level 13 or 18Ongoing 15 fire damage; Ongoing 10 fire damage.
Level 23 or 28Ongoing 20 fire damage; ongoing 10 fire damage.
MissThe target takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Level 18, 23 or 28Ongoing 10 fire damage.

item.title: Drowsy Dust
item.fluff: You blow the dust from the palm of your hand so it spreads through the air and clouds your opponent's senses

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 2/5 (one creature); item's level +3 vs. Fortitude
You can score a critical hit on a natural roll of 18 to 20, but cannot score a critical hit at long range
HitThe target is drowsy (save ends).
CritThe target also grants combat advantage until the end of its next turn.
While drowsy, the target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses, and a -5 penalty to Perception checks.

item.title: Eyesting
item.fluff: The fine black powder has a bitter smell and burns the skin

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 2/5 (one creature); item's level +3 vs. Fortitude
You can score a critical hit on a natural roll of 18 to 20, but cannot score a critical hit at long range
hitThe target is blind until the end of your next turn.
CritThe target is blinded (save ends) or until the end of your next turn, whichever lasts longer.
AftereffectThe target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and Perception checks (save ends).
Creatures that do not rely on sight to detect other creatures are immune to the blinding effect, and only suffer the aftereffect.

item.title: Flamebane Bomb
item.fluff: This crystal cylinder of blue liquid quells flame when it explodes against a surface

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within 10 squares (each creature with a Fire aura and each Fire Zone in the burst); Item's level +4 vs. Fortitude
Hit The target's Fire aura is deactivated until the start of your next turn, or the zone is destroyed, ending immediately.
EffectEach creature taking ongoing fire damage in the area can make a saving throw against the ongoing damage with a +2 bonus.
All natural fires in the area are extinguished, and magical flames must succeed on a saving throw or be extinguished until the start of your next turn.

item.title: Foaming Plaster
item.fluff: When you combine these two reagents, one chalky and one viscous, a billow of expanding foam quickly forms in the area and then soon afterward hardens

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou mix the plaster.
Once before the end of the encounter, you can use a minor action to create an impression in the wet plaster of a footprint, a key, or a similar small object.
Giving the hardened plaster to someone else allows that person to identify the footprint, duplicate the key, and so on as if he or she had the original item.
If the plaster is not used by the end of the encounter, it hardens into a lump.

item.title: Four-sided Caltrop
item.fluff: This small pyramid is carved from smoky quartz, but upon closer inspection, it appears to be filled with viscous liquid

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectArea burst 1 within 5 squares; The burst creates a zone of viscous liquid until the end of your next turn.
Level 13Until the end of the encounter.
A creature that enters the zone or starts its turn there is slowed (save ends).

item.title: Frozen Whetstone
item.fluff: A weapon honed with this blue-white crystalline whetstone becomes icy to the touch
item.headline: Formula Cost550 gp
Key SkillArcana or Nature
Time30 minutes

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectMelee 1 (one melee or ranged weapon you hold); Until the end of the encounter, attacks with the target weapon deal 2 extra cold damage.
Level 174 extra cold damage.
Level 276 extra cold damage.

item.title: Ghoststrike Oil
item.fluff: A weapon coated with this murky oil exudes a ghostly yellow mist

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectMelee touch (one weapon or a bundle of ammunition); You apply the oil to the target. The target remains affected until the end of the encounter.
While affected, the following attack is automatically made:
TriggerYou hit an undead creature that is insubstantial with a Weapon attack using the affected weapon
AttackSpecial (triggering creature); Item's level +2 vs. Fortitude
Hit The triggering attack ignores the insubstantial trait.

item.title: Glassteel Shard
item.fluff: Strong as steel, this tempered glass shard enhances the force with which a power strikes
item.headline: Formula Cost550 gp
Key SkillArcana or Nature
Time1 hour

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou use an encounter power or daily power that has the Force keyword and is of a lower level than this reagent
EffectYou slide each target up to 2 squares after other all other effects of the triggering power.
Level 17Slide up to 4 squares.
Level 27Slide up to 6 squares.

item.title: Goodnight Tincture
item.fluff: This odorless, tasteless elixir can incapacitate a foe without harming it
item.headline: Formula Cost450 gp
Key SkillNature of Thievery
Time1 hour

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackItem's level +6 vs. Fortitude
HitThe target becomes unconscious for 1 hour. This also ends if the target takes damage or is subject to violent motion.
AftereffectThe target is dazed (save ends).
MissThe target is dazed (save ends).

item.title: Greenbane
item.fluff: This stick of fast-burning incense creates a haze of smoke that keeps plant creatures from closing on the user

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 1; the burst creates a zone of incense until the end of the encounter.
Level 14 or 19Close burst 2
Level 24 or 29Close burst 3
Each time a plant enters or starts its turn in the zone, the following attack automatically happens against it:
AttackClose burst special (triggering plant); Item's level +6 vs. Will
Hit The target is slid to the closest space outside of the zone, and if it was moving, it stops. If it has actions remaining, it can use them to resume moving.

item.title: Heartflow
item.fluff: The target's eyes glaze as a smile spreads across its face

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: AttackItem's level +5 vs. Fortitude
Hit The target is affected by heartflow (save ends).
While affected, the target takes a -5 penalty to Insight checks and a -2 penalty to Will defense. If the creature continues to consume the target food or drink, it does not get to attempt a save.

MissThe target takes a -5 penalty to Insight checks until the end of its next turn. If the creature continues to consume the target food or drink, the effect continues to affect it unti the end of its following turn.

item.title: Herbal Poultice
item.fluff: This pack of specially prepared medicinal herbs increase one's natural recuperative ability

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectMelee touch (one creature); The target regains 2 additional hit points for each healing surge he or she spends at the end of the rest. The poultice has no effect on a creature that is 10 or more levels higher than the poultice.
Level 84 additional hit points.
Level 136 additional hit points.
Level 188 additional hit points.
Level 2310 additional hit points.
Level 2812 additional hit points.

item.title: Holy Water
item.fluff: Undead and demons react poorly to the touch of this liquid

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 5/10 (one undead or demon) or Close blast 2 (all undead and demons in the blast); Item's level + 4 vs Reflex
Hit 1d10 radiant damage.
Level 62d10 radiant damage.
Level 113d10 radiant damage.
Level 164d10 radiant damage.
Level 214d10 radiant damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Level 265d10 radiant damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
MissHalf damage.

item.title: Icening
item.fluff: When you toss this crystal into water, it freezes that liquid solid
item.headline: Formula Cost100 gp
Key SkillArcana or Nature
Time1 hour

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within 10 squares (each creature at least partially submerged in water); Item's level +5 vs. Fortitude
Level 20, 25 or 30Area burst 2 within 10 squares
HitThe target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
MissThe target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
EffectThe burst creates a zone of frozen water until the end of the encounter.
Water in the zone is difficult terrain.
If no creature is in the zone when it is created, water in the zone turns solid instead.

item.title: Inferno Oil
item.fluff: Your weapon leaves behind a faint trace of oil, but enough to set your enemy ablaze when exposed to open flame
item.headline: Formula Cost200 gp
Key SkillArcana, Nature or Thievery
Time1 hour

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectMelee touch (one weapon or one piece of ammunition); You apply the oil to the target weapon. The target remains affected until the end of the encounter.
While affected, the following attack is automatically made as a reaction:
TriggerYou hit with a Weapon attack using the affected weapon
Attack Special (the triggering creature); Item's level +2 vs. Reflex
HitThe triggering creature gains vulnerable 5 fire (save ends).
Level 15 or 20Vulnerable 10 fire.
Level 25 or 30Vulnerable 15 fire.

item.title: Lockburst Chalk
item.fluff: When fitted within a keyhole, this thin stick of gray chalk can force open the most complicated locks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: CheckThievery at +9 vs. lock DC
Level 9At +12.
Level 14At +16.
Level 19At +19.
Level 24At +23.
Level 29At +26.
SuccessThe target lock is destroyed.
FailureThe target lock's DC decreases by 5.
Failure by 10 or moreThe target lock's DC increases by 5.

item.title: Lodret Leaf
item.fluff: Chewing on this infused leaf provides added insurance against disease
item.headline: Formula Cost200 gp
Key SkillHeal or Nature
Time15 minutes

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain a +2 bonus to Fortitude defense against attacks made by diseases and to saving throws against diseases. The disease must be of a level equal to or lower than this item's level +5, and the bonus lasts until the end of the encounter.

item.title: Longbreath
item.fluff: The refreshing air inside this container fills your lungs for more fully than its volume would suggest

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou inhale the contents of the container.
Until the start of your next short or extended rest, you gain a +5 item bonus to Endurance checks to avoid suffocation.
Level 14+10 item bonus.
Level 24+15 item bonus.

item.title: Nightmare Tongue Dust
item.fluff: The tongue of nightmare beasts is required to make this antihealing reagent, with tongues from more power powerful creatures going into the stronger forms of the dust
item.headline: Formula Cost450 gp
Key SkillArcana or Nature
Time1 hour

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou use an encounter attack or daily attack power that has a damage keyword and is of a lower level than this reagent
EffectOne target hit by the triggering attack cannot regain hit points until it has taken a long rest.

item.title: Oil of Lasting Flame
item.fluff: A vial of this oil provides head and flame for a long time

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou use this oil to start a fire or light a torch.
The fire burns for 8 hours using its existing fuel. It can be put out by normal means.
Level 12The fire burns until it is put out.

item.title: Pacification Dust
item.fluff: This powder of fungal spores renders those caught in it sluggish
item.headline: Formula Cost200 gp
Key SkillDungeoneering or Nature
Time30 minutes

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within 10 (each creature in the burst); Item's level +3 vs. Fortitude
HitThe target cannot take a standard action before the end of its next turn.
CritThe effect is (save ends) instead.
AftereffectThe target is slowed until the end of its next turn.
Level 20, 25 or 30The aftereffect is (save ends) instead.
Miss (Level 20, 25 or 30)The target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

item.title: Panther Tears
item.fluff: For a moment your vision is blurry, but when you blink away the excess liquid, you can see clearly through the gloom

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain low-light vision until the end of your next turn.
Level 7For 5 minutes.
Level 12For 1 hour.

item.title: Phantom Paint
item.fluff: The dark fluid within this small ceramic bottle glows dimly in torchlight

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou apply the paint to an area no larger than 5 square feet on a solid object.
The area emits dim light that is visible only in lamplight, torchlight, or some other light shed by an open flame, and lasts for 24 hours.
Level 7Lasts for a week.

item.title: Precarious Crystal
item.fluff: This small, clear crystal collapses into a tiny flame in response to motion, activating a nearby alchemical item
item.headline: Formula Cost120 gp
Key SkillArcana or Thievery
Time30 minutes

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou place this crystal and a second volatile alchemical item in a square adjacent to you. The volatile alchemical item must of the same level or lower as this crystal.

The first time after the end of your current turn that a creature enters the crystal's square or a square adjacent to it, the crystal activates as a nonaction interrupt. When it activates, the crystal uses the volatile alchemical item against the triggering creature.
SpecialNoticing the crystal requires a Perception check with a Hard DC of its level if a creature did not see it being placed.
A creature that knows the crystal is there can use a standard action to disarm it by succeeding on an Arcana check or a Thievery check against a Hard DC of the crystal's level.
Level 15 or 20Disarming the crystal requires two successes.
Level 25 or 30Disarming the crystal requires three successes.

item.title: Primal Element
item.fluff: Creatures not of this world suffer the sting of this primal essence

block.name: Property
block.line: A primal element sheds light like a candle (dim light in a 2-square radius).

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 4/8 (one aberrant, elemental, fey, immortal, or undead creature); Item's level +4 vs. Fortitude
Hit 1d8 damage, and the target does not benefit from resistances until the end of your next turn.
Level 72d8 damage.
Level 124d8 damage.
Level 175d8 damage.
Level 226d8 damage.
Level 277d8 damage.
MissHalf damage.

item.title: Protean Silk
item.fluff: You draw forth a long, thin filament from this viscous glob that you can turn into a strong rope that lasts for a while
item.headline: Formula Cost350 gp
Key SkillArcana, Nature, or Thievery
Time1 hour

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou extract a silk strand that can stretch up to 40 squares (200 feet) away. The strand does not move on its, but it can be carried or attached to an arrow, bolt, or some other ammunition.

As a minor action, you can turn the strand into a silk rope for 1 hour. As part of this action, you can securely attach the head of the strand to a surface. Two characters working together can attach both ends to separate surfaces.
Level 11For 8 hours.
At the end of its duration, the rope dissolves, leaving no trace of it. You can also dissolve the rope as a minor action.

item.title: Resonance Crystal
item.fluff: This crystal amplifies noise until it becomes unbearable to all in its proximity
item.headline: Formula Cost160 gp
Key SkillArcana or Nature
Time1 hour

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectArea burst 1 within 10 squares; The burst creates a zone of amplified sound until the end of your next turn.
Creatures in the zone have vulnerable 2 thunder.
Level 9Vulnerable 3 thunder.
Level 14Vulnerable 5 thunder.
Level 19Vulnerable 7 thunder.
Level 24Vulnerable 10 thunder.
Level 29Vulnerable 12 thunder.

item.title: Rust Bomb
item.fluff: On impact, this glass vial breaks, releasing a rusting agent that begins to deteriorate metal armor
item.headline: Formula Cost150 gp
Key SkillArcana or Nature
Time1 hour

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 5/10 (one creature wearing metal armor or with a metallic body); Item's level +4 vs. Fortitude
HitThe target takes a -1 penalty to AC until the end of the encounter.
CritThe penalty increases to -2 until the end of your next turn.
MissThe target takes a -1 penalty to AC for the first attack targeting AC made against it before the end of your next turn.

item.title: Slow-Step Oil
item.fluff: A weapon coated with this white oil has the power to slow the movement of a foe

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectMelee touch (one weapon or piece of ammunition); Until the end of the encounter, when you hit with an attack using the target, you make the following attack against the same target, until this attack hits:
AttackItem's level + 4 vs. Fortitude
Hit The target is slowed (save ends).

item.title: Smokestick
item.fluff: This rod of alchemical clay ignites to release a haze of obscuring smoke
item.headline: Formula Cost120 gp
Key SkillArcana or Thievery
Time1 hour

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectArea burst 2 within 5 squares; The burst creates zone of smoke until the end of your next turn.
Squares in the zone are lightly obscured.

item.title: Sovereign Glue
item.fluff: This vial of gray paste creates a virtually unbreakable bond between the objects it glues together

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 5/10 (one creature); Item's level +3 vs. Reflex
Hit The target is slowed (save ends).
CritThe target is immobilized immobilized until the end of its next turn instead.
AftereffectThe target is slowed (save ends).

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou apply this glue to an object and affix that object to another object within 1 square of you.

If the two objects remain affixed to one another until the end of your next turn (which might require you to hold them together), the items are adhered. Once adhered, separating them requires a DC 21 Strength check. A successful check deals 2d10 damage to each adhered object.
Level 8DC 24.
Level 13DC 29, and 3d10 damage.
Level 18DC 32, and 3d10 damage.
Level 23DC 37, and 4d10 damage.
Level 28DC 40, and 4d10 damage.

item.title: Stormglass Shard
item.fluff: This jagged-edged glass is potently magical, and hums with thunderous power
item.headline: Formula Cost350 gp
Key SkillArcana or Nature
Time30 minutes

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou use an encounter attack or daily attack power that has the Lightning or Thunder keyword and is of a lower level than this reagent
EffectYou push each target that takes damage from the triggering power up to 2 squares. If you cannot push the target because of blocking terrain, the target is knocked prone.
Level 11 or 16Push up to 4 squares.
Level 21 or 26Push up to 6 squares.

item.title: Suppression Crystal
item.fluff: The crystal diminishes the lightning bolt and silences the thunder
item.headline: Formula Cost120 gp
Key SkillArcana or Nature
Time1 hour

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou are protected by the suppression crystal. You gain resist 2 thunder and resist 2 lightning until the end of the encounter.
Level 14Resist 3 thunder and resist 3 lightning.
Level 24Resist 5 thunder and resist 5 lightning.
Also, you can use the following action:

Nonaction Interrupt: Trigger: You take damage from a Lightning or Thunder attack; You gain resist 10 thunder and resist 10 lightning against the triggering attack. The effects of the suppression crystal end after the triggering attack has been resolved.
Level 14Resist 20 thunder and resist 20 lightning.
Level 24Resist 30 thunder and resist 30 lightning.

item.title: Sweet Water
item.fluff: This small glob of white jelly purifies even the most toxic food and drink, from poisons to dwarven spirits

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou apply the sweet water to a portion of food equivalent to a light meal for one person, or to a single serving of a beverage.
The sweet water removes any poison or disease present in the food or beverage after 1 minute.
It cannot remove poison or disease from food or drink that is already in a creature's system.

item.title: Talent Shard
item.fluff: This crystal is imbued with the essence of a specific talent, releasing insight into that talent for a short time when broken

block.name: Special
block.line: When this item is created, the creator chooses one skill.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain a +2 item bonus to checks with the chosen skill until the end of the encounter.
Level 8+3 item bonus.
Level 13+5 item bonus.
Level 18+6 item bonus.
Level 23+8 item bonus.
Level 28+9 item bonus.

item.title: Tanglefoot Bag
item.fluff: This small leather bag or satchel contains a sticky gel that can immobilize foes
item.headline: tanglefoot ammunition

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 5/10 (one creature); item's level +4 vs. Reflex
Hit The target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
AftereffectThe target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
MissThe target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Tension Wheel
item.fluff: With a click, the tension wheel unlocks and propels the bolt through your enemy
item.headline: Formula Cost120 gp
Key SkillArcana or Thievery
Time30 minutes

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect Melee touch (one loaded crossbow you are holding); Until the end of the encounter, Weapon attacks made with the target have the following benefits:
The normal range increases by 2 and the long range by 4.
Level 19, 24, or 29By 3 and 6, respectively.
The attack deals 1 additional damage.
Level 92 additional damage.
Level 143 additional damage.
Level 194 additional damage.
Level 245 additional damage.
Level 296 additional damage.
If an attack deals reduced damage on a miss, half of this additional damage applies to it.

item.title: Tethercord
item.fluff: You fling the device at the enemy, and one side sticks to the creature while other bonds with the ground
item.headline: tethering ammunition

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 5/10 (one creature); item's level +4 vs. Reflex
Hit The target cannot move more than 3 squares from the space it occupies when it is hit (save ends).
CritThe target takes a -5 penalty to its saving throws against this effect.
The target has a -5 penalty to save against this effect on any turn that it did not move at least 2 squares.
MissThe target treats all squares beyond 3 squares from the space it occupies when missed as difficult terrain until the end of its next turn.

item.title: Thunderstone
item.fluff: On impact, this clay sphere unleashes a clap of thunder that can deafen creatures and knock them back
item.headline: Formula Cost200 gp
Key SkillArcana, Nature, or Thievery
Time1 hour
thunder ammunition

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within 10 squares (each creature in the burst); Item's level +4 vs. Fortitude
Hit1d6 thunder damage, and the target is pushed 1 square from the center of the burst, and deafened (save ends).
Level 102d6 thunder damage.
Level 154d6 thunder damage.
Level 205d6 thunder damage, and pushed at least 1 square and up to 2 squares.
Level 256d6 thunder damage, and pushed at least 1 square and up to 2 squares.
Level 307d6 thunder damage, and pushed at least 1 square and up to 2 squares.

item.title: Tracking Dust
item.fluff: You spread the fine grains of this silver dust to reveal the subtlest tracks
item.headline: Formula Cost140 gp
Key SkillNature or Thievery
Time30 minutes

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou spread the dust over 5 contiguous squares (you can arrange the squares however you like). The dust creates a zone of highlighting silver for 1 hour.
Level 14 or 1910 contiguous squares.
Level 24 or 2920 contiguous squares.
A creature attempting to track or otherwise find tracks inside the zone can make the check using a +9 check modifier instead of its own, and is considered trained when doing so.
Level 9+12 check modifier.
Level 14+16 check modifier.
Level 19+19 check modifier.
Level 24+23 check modifier.
Level 29+26 check modifier.

item.title: Trackless Ashes
item.fluff: You dump these ashes into your campfire, removing all signs of the camp and of your passage from it
item.headline: Formula Cost350 gp
Key SkillNature or Thievery
Time15 minutes

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou pour the ashes into a dying campfire. After 5 minutes, the remains of the campfire as well as all tracks within 20 squares of it vanish.

item.title: Vial of Darkness
item.fluff: This glass vial is filled to the brim with a black liquid and stoppered with a thick gob of dried black wax
item.headline: Formula Cost200 gp
Key SkillArcana or Nature
Time1 hour

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 1; The burst creates a zone of darkness until the end of your next turn.
Level 10Close burst 2.
Level 15Close burst 2. At the end of your next turn, the zone is reduced to close burst 1, and it persists until the end of your following turn.
The zone is totally obscured.

item.title: Violet Phosphor
item.fluff: Vigorously agitating this small, transparent vial causes the liquid inside to emit a soft purple glow

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou shake the container, and it sheds bright light in a 5-square radius and dim light for 5 squares beyond that. The light lasts up to 4 hours.

item.title: Walking Death
item.fluff: One moment, your victim is all smiles; the next, it keels over and dies
item.headline: Formula Cost200 gp
Key SkillNature or Thievery
Time15 minutes

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: AttackItem's level +5 vs. Fortitude
HitThe target is affected with no symptoms for 1d6 hours.
AftereffectThe target is affected by walking death (save ends).
While affected, the target takes ongoing 10 poison damage and is dazed.
Level 15 or 20Ongoing 20 poison damage.
Level 25 or 30Ongoing 30 poison damage.

item.title: Woundpatch
item.fluff: You slap the fleshy bandage on your ally and the patch knits with his or her flesh when needed

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectMelee touch (one creature); You place the woundpatch on the target. The first time before the end of the encounter that the target regains hit points based on its healing surge value, it regains an additional 4 hit points.
Level 88 additional hit points.
Level 1312 additional hit points.
Level 1816 additional hit points.
Level 2320 additional hit points.
Level 2825 additional hit points.
